entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improvements for Delegate.GetHashCode() for CsWinRT (and NativeAOT) #96947
  • Inline array Equals unexpected behavior #96943
  • JIT should be able to elide zeroing of fields after allocations #96942
    9.0.0
  • Tiered miscompilation of Vector2.Dot(x, x) without SSE4.1 #96939
  • Stateless Managed->Unmanaged marshaller does call GetPinnableReference #96932

Closed

  • Precise liveness for LCL_FLD-s #49199
    Future
  • mono_install_marshal_callbacks is not reentrant? #96929
  • [monovm] Assertion at object.c:657, condition `lock->done' not met #96872
    8.0.x
  • Convert all FCalls with HELPER_METHOD_FRAME to QCalls #95695
    Future
  • CPU set affinity is not respected by ProcessorCount on Windows #94364
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • breaking a string on many lines produce incorrect result if followed by a call #96948
    area-System.CodeDom, community-contribution
  • Enable the gshared-mrgctx mode by default. #96946
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Disable load/store vector APIs until Mono adds support for it #96944
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable riscv64 R2R in installer #96941
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Update ConfigurationKeyNameAttribute.cs #96940
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • EventPipe: Don't clean up thread list on shutdown #96936
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix maintenance of `genReturnBB` pointer #96935
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JitDump and other minor improvements #96933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Avx512 support to ProbabilisticMap #96931
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • Fix assertion at BigInteger.TryParse(null, out _) #96930
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Improve TeddyHelper.RightShift helpers for ARM #96928
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Delete old DFS and dominator implementations #96927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove more helper frames by converting methods to QCalls #96926
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0

Merged

  • [mono][jit] Patch jump trampolines on amd64/arm64 after a method has … #96757
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix hwintrinsicChild->isContained() assert #96388
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] GT_STORE_BLK - do not call memset for blocks containg gc pointers on heap #96514
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][debugger] Fix debug lazy loaded assemblies when webcil is enabled #96825
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.x
  • Comment out assert to workaround codegen bug #96877
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] Fix class initialization spurious wakeups #96905
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.x
  • Remove uses of FCThrow in interlocked helpers #96916
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix nativeaot-outerloop #96906
    area-System.Linq

Updated

  • JIT: Pass field's owner to getFieldType #96794
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][debugger] fake bind_static_method #96899
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] 32-bit platform ObjWriter and bit rot fixes #96890
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Crossgen2 PDB generation (again) #96566
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Refine Bin/Hex parsing of BigInteger #95543
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Share unified UTF-8/16 parsing with BigInteger #95402
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • [IGNORE] Testing `Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0` PR #96459
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • Cse metrics #96880
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move PendingTypeLoadTable from the ClassLoader object to a global structure #96653
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Re-add Stack Overflow handling in NativeAOT with larger alternate stack #95808
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95216
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.2

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • UX when specifying a PublishProfile that does not exist. #37822

Updated

  • PackageInstall.Tests timeout known build error #36192
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • No DisableTransitiveProjectReferences analog for package references? #11803
  • A date in the Hebrew calendar leads to an error when log file is created #37932
  • -warnnotaserror does not work for warning NU1605 #37972
  • `dotnet-format` reports errors *only* in `--verify-no-changes` mode for ?: expressions #37812

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #37986
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update for loc #37985
    localization, Area-Infrastructure, DO NOT MERGE
  • Update CI #37984
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #37953
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Install manifests for rollback after update --from-rollback-file #37965
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads, 8.0.1xx
  • Remove unneeded strings from an error message #37973
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Add dotnet package search #37916
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the workload feature band #37974
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • German translation for "in" (generic parameter tooltips) is wrong #71633
  • German translation for "Track Value Source" can be improved #71632
  • German translation for "Directives from" in inheritance margin can be improved #71631
  • Dropdowns in Code Style options have varying heights in other languages #71630
  • Add a guarding code which prevents putting Compilation into ISG pipeline. #71629
  • Provide a public Nagivation API #71627
  • Update Features test baselines for TFM-dependent tests #71625

Closed

  • Roslyn Compilation, 160 errors and process terminated due to NullReferenceException when a class with primary constructor implements INotifyPropertyChanged #71400
    17.10
  • Refresh ILVerify and file runtime issues as needed #69860
    17.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify how we add .editorconfigs to Solution Items #71626
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Separate the process of creating an event accessor parameter and the process of figuring out its type. #71497
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors, Next
  • Merge main to features/lsp_configuration #71624
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update ILVerify bits #71544
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71623
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/lsp_configuration #71635
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #71634
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and package references #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Target Workspace and Features layer tests to .NET #71590
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure thread-safety in aggregated telemetry #71606
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge pull request #1 from dotnet/master #66751
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Do not throw exceptions when we can't make a doc id #71451
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Include buildhost deps.json #71597
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Only use ReadyToRun on Release builds #71622
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [cherry-pick] Fix build definition #71621
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement extension indexer access #69122
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Invoke code mapper via reflection #70667
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #53352
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #53351
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #53348
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #53347
  • Add ability to scaffold .Net core 8 api endpoints in project and override these #53343

Closed

  • You must install or update .NET to run this application. #53260
  • Perf regression: fortunes, json, json #53278
  • Perf improvement: https, mvc #53345
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #53346
  • There are multiple .NET runtimes present, so a default dispatcher could not be resolved. Use DotNetObject to invoke .NET instance methods. #53330
  • Unhandled ChannelClosedException while debugging #53325
  • Perf improvement: caching, plainTextWithFilter #53320
  • [Feature] JS colocation without config #53319
  • Blazor SSR incorrect DOM patching for checkbox/radio controls #53039
  • Blazor 8 SSR cannot change Pagetitle when StreamRendering is true or when in rendermodeserver prerendering is false #52689

PullRequests

Updated

  • [release/6.0] [Blazor] Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props` not getting packed correctly #52973
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] [Blazor] Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props` not getting packed correctly #52972
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props` not getting packed correctly #52971
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI 6.1.0 Popup page Wordwrap on label stop working #19878
  • RoundRectangle Border is messed up when contains an Image with AspectFill #19877
  • Platform specifics are all included in compilation #19876

Closed

  • text on button disappears UI problem #14533
    Backlog
  • Navigation menu not showing in Blazor app if project name has space between #13735

PullRequests

Created

  • Ignore ScrollRectToVisible if KeyboardAutoManagerScroll is enabled in ItemsViewController #19875
    community ✨

Updated

  • [Catalyst] Allow to use a custom WKUIDelegate on WebView #18483
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [xamlg] improve error for Xamarin.Forms namespace #19683
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [Testing] Added appium UITest for FlyoutNavigationBetweenItemsWithNavigationStacks #19444
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
